item.title: Local NY political candidate missing for almost a week
item.description: A New York county legislature candidate has been missing for almost a week, according to the Nassau County Police Department.

item.title: Trump giving ABC News 1st broadcast interview at 100 days mark
item.description: President Trump is giving the first broadcast interview at the 100 days mark to ABC News.
